Things to do in Amsterdam

De dam

The Dam Square is named after its original function: It was built in the 13th century and used to be a dam in the Amstel river. The combination of ‘Amstel’ and ‘Dam’ also makes up the name Amsterdam… Hotels nearby De Dam

Artis Zoo

The oldest zoo in the whole of Europe can be found in Amsterdam: Artis Zoo, which was opened in 1838. Over 700 animal species can be found in Artis. Every day you get the possibility to watch, when some of the animals are fed… Hotels nearby Artis Zoo

Rijksmuseum

In 1800 the first Rijksmuseum (National Museum) opened its doors, which was called the 'Nationale Kunst Gallerij' (National art gallery). At that time it was located in Huis ten Bosch in The Hague… Hotels nearby Rijksmuseum

Concertgebouw

In the year 1881 some prominent citizens of Amsterdam held a meeting, to discuss about art and culture in the capital. They decided that the time was ripe to build a new Concertgebouw (concert hall)… Hotels nearby Concertgebouw
